name: Pearls of Wisdom
description:
Explore the ocean depths on the hunt for treasure and inspiration!  

Dive to the ocean floor, searching for clams that contain the answers to the mysteries of life, the universe, and angling. 

Features:

A whole sea to scour for hidden tresasure!

10 pearls to hunt down, containing words of wisdom that will challenge your very worldview*!

Unlockable upgrades to allow you to search even deeper and bypass locked doors!

Fish!  (Not fishing, just fish.  I realise the angling comment above might have set some false expectations.)

*worldview challenging, or wisdom, or even sense, not guaranteed
